title: The Bear That Wasn't
description: A hibernating bear awakens to find himself smack dab in the middle of a sprawling industrial complex! To make matters even worse, every one he meets keeps insisting that he's not even a bear â€” just a silly man who needs a shave and wears a fur coat. 46 illustrations.Book PaperbackPublication 11/2/2007 64Reading Age 8 and Up
author: Frank Tashlin
